verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a tweet Sunday afternoon] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he will demand that the Justice Department investigate whether it or the FBI spied on his 2016 presidential campaign for political] ...
In a tweet Sunday afternoon , President Donald Trump said he [V: will] demand that the Justice Department investigate whether it or the FBI spied on his 2016 presidential campaign for political ...
